capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been reading about Harry and his talents, and it's clear that he's a quididic-chaser. That's a pretty specific skill, but apparently it's one of his strengths. I'm quite certain that this is accurate, so I'd say I can confirm that information.
capsules_submitted.reply: i am glad to have learned something new. i've never heard of harry before, but i'm so excited to learn more about him!

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Harry's affiliation is indeed Hogwarts. I'm quite certain about that, and it's a fact that's widely known.
capsules_submitted.reply: i am curious. what is the name of the character in the hogwarts lineage?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Harry's hair is looking a bit dark today. I think he really does have black hair, you know?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was talking to Harry the other day and he actually has black hair. I'm pretty sure about it now that I think back. It's not like he'd just dye his hair black or anything, so yeah, he definitely has black hair.
